alert.note: Alert for Schuylkill (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 5:29PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN SCHUYLKILL COUNTY THROUGH 600 PM EDT... At 528 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Schuylkill Haven to 10 miles south of Pottsville. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pottsville, Schuylkill Haven, St. Clair, Orwigsburg, Port Carbon, Tuscarora, New Philadelphia, Friedensburg, Marlin, Renningers, McKeansburg, Lake Wynonah, Cressona, Palo Alto, Auburn, Deer Lake, Cumbola, Middleport, Port Clinton and New Ringgold. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central Pennsylvania.
